title: Welcome to DS and Algo for beginners!

first.title: Objective
first.subtitle: Be among the bests
first.text: These companies are the biggest product driven tech companies in the world.

second.title: Process
second.subtitle: Tough but pays off
second.text: The greatest companies will hire based on potential, which will need to be assessed during the interview process.

third.title: Success
third.subtitle: Great benefits, progression and salary!
third.text: This potential is 99% of the times measured using algorithmic problems, that will let the interviewer know how the candidate approaches problems.

first.title: Introduction
first.learningObjsTitle: At the end of this course you will be able to
first.obj1: Understand basic data structures and how data is organized in the real world.
first.obj3: Analyze the efficiency of different algorithms.
